elements.name: Verify user can create an account into Retail Website

steps.name: User clicks on Create New Accout button
User fills the signUp form with below data
User click on SignUp button
User should be logged into account page

User clicks on Sign in option
User enters following login credentials

elements.name: Verify User can add an item to cart

steps.name: User change the category to 'Smart Home'
User search for an item 'Kasa outdoor smart plug'
User click on Search icon
User click on item
User select quantity '2'
User click add to Cart button
the cart icon quantity should change to "2"
User is on retail website
User clicks on Sign in option
User enters following login credentials
User clicks on login button
User should be logged into their account

elements.name: Verify User can place an order without Shipping address and payment Method on file

steps.name: User click on Cart option
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click Add a new address link for shipping address
user fill new address form during checkout
User click Add Your Address button
User click Add a credit card or Debit Card for Payment method
User fills debit or credit card information during checkout
User click on Add your card button
User click on Place Your Order
Order placed message should be displayed "Order Placed, Thanks"
User is on retail website
User clicks on Sign in option
User enters following login credentials
User clicks on login button
User should be logged into their account

elements.name: Verify User can place an order with Shipping address and payment Method on file

steps.name: User change the category to 'Electronics'
User search for an item 'Apex Legends'
User click on Search icon
User click on item
User select quantity '5'
User click add to Cart button
the cart icon quantity should change to '5'
User click on Cart option
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click on Place Your Order
Order placed message should be displayed "Order Placed, Thanks"
User is on retail website
User clicks on Sign in option
User enters following login credentials
User clicks on login button
User should be logged into their account
User click on Orders section

elements.name: Verify User can cancel the order

steps.name: User click on first order in list
User click on Cancel The Order button
User select the cancelation Reason "Bought wrong item"
User click on Cancel Order button
A message should be displayed for canceled order "Your Order Has Been Cancelled"
User is on retail website
User clicks on Sign in option
User enters following login credentials
User clicks on login button
User should be logged into their account
User click on Orders section

elements.name: Verify User can Return the order

steps.name: User click on first order in list
User click on Return Items button
User select the Return Reason "Item damaged"
User select the drop off service "FedEx"
User click on Return Order button
Message for return order should be displayed "Return was successfull"
User is on retail website
User clicks on Sign in option
User enters following login credentials
User clicks on login button
User should be logged into their account
User click on Orders section

elements.name: Verify User can write a review on order placed

steps.name: User click on Review button
User write Review headline "Great Game!" and review text "Apex coins are needed to purchase some cool skins"

arguments.val: "Apex coins are needed to purchase some cool skins"

steps.name: User click Add your Review button
review message should be displayed "Your review was added successfully"

name: Retail Order Page functionalities. User can review, cancel, or return an order.
